name: Send site data from Webflow to an HTTP endpoint
description: Streamline your website management by automatically sending data from your Webflow sites to your desired endpoint. With this template, every time there is a change or update on your Webflow site, Make will trigger an action to send the relevant data via HTTP. This integration ensures that you stay informed and can take immediate action based on the latest updates from your Webflow projects, enhancing your workflow efficiency and responsiveness.
